item.title: Requirements
item.description: Oracle VM VirtualBox >= 6.1 Vagrant >= 2.2 Ansible >= 2.9 Optional mkcert Vagrant plugin (optional) vagrant-hostsupdater vagrant-vbguest vagrant-serverspec
